tds_sections.notes: Deduct on amount exclusive of GST if GST shown separately
exceptions: Payment to GTA when GTA pays GST under forward charge

tds_sections._ambiguity_note: Classification between technical and professional is often disputed. IT services with significant human expertise component may be treated as professional.

tds_sections.notes: TDS applicable on GST component for rent
Only if buyer's turnover exceeds 10Cr in previous FY
tds_sections.precedence_note: If 206C(1H) applicable on seller, 194Q takes precedence

tds_sections.form_10f_benefit: Reduced rate under DTAA requires Form 10F, Tax Residency Certificate
tds_sections.notes: GST under RCM is separate liability

tds_sections.applicable_when: Vendor has not filed ITR for 2 preceding years AND aggregate TDS/TCS > 50000 in each year

lower_deduction_certificate.description: Vendor can obtain certificate for lower/nil TDS

threshold_computation.single_vs_aggregate: Most sections have both single transaction AND aggregate annual thresholds
threshold_computation.fy_boundary: Thresholds reset on April 1st each year
threshold_computation.branch_consolidation: Payments to same vendor across branches should be aggregated

tds_on_gst_clarity.general_rule: TDS should be on amount excluding GST if GST is shown separately
tds_on_gst_clarity.exception_194I: For rent u/s 194I, TDS is on gross amount including GST

_test_traps.trap_1: 194J technical vs professional distinction is subjective - model must handle ambiguity

_test_traps.trap_3: 206AB requires ITR filing status check which may not be available
